About me

I am a tenure-track assistant professor with Department of Computer Science, Aalborg University, Denmark. I am a faculty member of Data Engineering, Science and Systems (DESS) group. I received the Ph.D. degree from Aalborg University, Denmark, in 2022, under the supervision of Prof. Christian S. Jensen, Prof. Lu Chen, and Prof. Torben Bach Pedersen. I am the recipient of 2022 IEEE International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE) Best Paper Award (first author), 2023 International Conference on Cyber Energy Systems and Intelligent Energies (ICCSIE) Best Paper Award, and 2022 National Database Conference (NDBC) One of the Best Papers Award. I am the project co-investigator of Horizon European Framework Program (HORIZON) and Digital Research Centre Denmark Project (DIREC).

Research Interests

My current research interests include:

  • Data Management and Analytics
  • Intelligent Transportation
  • Database Technology
  • Machine Learning
  • Complex Network
  • Digital Twin
